metadata.name: The Otherworldly Connection
metadata.description:
A haunting AI artwork showing a woman surrounded by strange animals, creating a sense of resignation and unease. It captures our complex relationship with animals, reflecting fascination, tension, and exploitation. The woman's expression conveys sadness ,She is torn between connecting with the animals and recognizing their danger, emphasizing the fragility of our bond with nature. 
Created for the AI Surrealism exhibition at Oculus NYC, hosted by Superchief Gallery NFT and Exquisite Workers.
